snippet: The IndyCar driver James Hinchcliffe was taken to a hospital for leg surgery after slamming his car into the wall at Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
abstract: IndyCar driver James Hinchcliffe undergoes leg surgery after crashing at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway; wreck is fourth during practice for the Indianapolis 500.
lead_paragraph: The IndyCar driver James Hinchcliffe was taken to a hospital for leg surgery after slamming his car into the wall at Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
